titleStmt.title: An exhortation to a personal and national repentance a sermon / preached at St. James Church, Westminster, Feb. 5, 1688/9 by Tho. Knaggs ...
titleStmt.author: Knaggs, Thomas, 1660 or 1-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Barnes ... and sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: "Printed at the request of several persons of quality."
Half-title p. lacking. Beginning-p.7 from defective Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
